seed_pair.known: Did you hear what he wanted to grow?
seed_pair.target: 你听到他想种什么了吗？

practice_phrases.known: Did you hear?
Did you hear what he said?
I didn't hear what he said.
Did you hear anything else?
Did you hear what your friend said?
practice_phrases.target: 你听到你的朋友说了什么吗？

practice_phrases.known: I heard that he was very quiet.
Did you hear what he wanted to say after you left?
practice_phrases.target: 你听到你离开后他想说什么了吗？

practice_phrases.known: I didn't hear anything else that your friend also said.
practice_phrases.target: 我没听到你的朋友还说了别的什么。

practice_phrases.known: Did you hear what he said about the place he didn't like?
practice_phrases.target: 你听到他说了他不喜欢的那个地方了吗？

practice_phrases.known: I heard that he wanted to say a lot after he was quite quiet yesterday.
practice_phrases.target: 我听说他昨天相当安静后想说很多话。

practice_phrases.known: He wanted to grow.
He wanted to grow something.
I heard he wanted to grow.
Did you hear he wanted to grow?
Your friend said he wanted to grow.
I heard he wanted to grow tomatoes.
Did you hear what he wanted to grow yesterday?
practice_phrases.target: 你听到他昨天想种什么了吗？

practice_phrases.known: I didn't hear anything else about what he wanted to grow.
practice_phrases.target: 我没听到他想种什么的别的什么。

practice_phrases.known: Did you hear what he wanted to grow in that place?
practice_phrases.target: 你听到他想在那个地方种什么了吗？

practice_phrases.known: Your friend also said he wanted to grow a lot of things after he was quiet.
practice_phrases.target: 你的朋友还说他安静后想种很多东西。

practice_phrases.known: Grow what?
He wanted to grow what
He said grow what
Did you hear grow what
He said he wanted to grow what
Your friend said grow what
I didn't hear what he wanted to grow
Your friend said he wanted to grow what
practice_phrases.target: 你的朋友说他想种什么

practice_phrases.known: Did you hear what he wanted to grow
I heard that he wanted to grow what
Did you hear?
Did he say?
Did you hear what he said?
practice_phrases.target: 你听到他说了什么了吗？

practice_phrases.known: Did your friend say?
Did you hear what she said?
practice_phrases.target: 你听到她说了什么了吗？

practice_phrases.known: Did he say anything else?
Did your friend say anything else?
practice_phrases.target: 你的朋友说了别的什么了吗？

practice_phrases.known: Did you hear what she said to him?
practice_phrases.target: 你听到她对他说了什么了吗？

practice_phrases.known: Did you hear what he wanted?
practice_phrases.target: 你听到他想要什么了吗？

practice_phrases.known: Did you hear what he wanted to grow?
practice_phrases.target: 你听到他想种什么了吗？
